privacy.section1_text: The data controller is Roy's Shack Est. 1888 (registered address: 7621 Pécs, Király Street 12., Hungary). For any data protection inquiries, please contact us at: privacy@roysshack.hu
privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.section3_text: Under the GDPR, data subjects have the following rights:
privacy.right_objection_desc: in the case of direct marketing
privacy.section4_text: We employ technical and organizational measures to protect personal data, including HTTPS/SSL encryption, JWT-based authentication, strict access control, and regular security audits. We do not share your data with third parties, except for the courier service required to fulfill your order.

terms.section3_text: Registration is required to make a purchase in the Store. By placing an order, the Customer accepts these T&C. Order confirmation is sent by email.
terms.section5_text: Ordered products are dispatched on business days, generally within 2–4 business days. Delivery is carried out by our contracted courier service. The Customer will receive an email notification regarding the shipment status.
terms.section4_text: All listed prices are in Hungarian Forint (HUF) and include VAT. Shipping costs may vary depending on the order total. Free shipping applies for orders over 15,000 HUF.
terms.title: Terms and Conditions
terms.section1_text: These Terms and Conditions (hereinafter: T&C) apply to the use of the Roy's Shack Est. 1888 online store (hereinafter: Store), and to all purchases made through the Store.
terms.section6_text: The Customer may withdraw from the contract within 14 days of receiving the product without giving a reason, in accordance with Government Decree 45/2014 (II. 26.). The right of withdrawal does not apply to prescription medications or unsealed healthcare products.
terms.section3_step1: Select products and add them to the cart

cookies.what_text: Cookies are small text files stored by the website in your browser, with your consent. They allow the website to remember your settings, maintain your login session, and improve the overall user experience. Certain features of the site are not available without cookies.
cookies.manage_text: You can manage cookies through your browser settings. Please note that disabling functional (essential) cookies may prevent certain features — such as logging in or using your cart — from working correctly. Analytics and preference cookies can be disabled at any time without affecting core functionality.
cookies.analytics_text: Help us understand how visitors interact with the website. The collected data is processed anonymously for statistical purposes.
cookies.preferences_text: Remember the settings selected by the user, such as language and display theme.
cookies.essential_text: Required for the proper functioning of the website. They include session identifiers and security tokens. The website cannot function properly without them.
cookies.title: Cookie Policy

legal.description: Terms and Conditions, Privacy Policy, and Cookie Policy

security.subtitle: Manage your password and account security
security.change_password_desc: To set a new password, we will send a confirmation email. Click the link in the email to approve the change.
security.password_changed: Your password has been successfully updated.
security.forgot_password_desc: If you have forgotten your current password, you can reset it via email — no login required. A password reset link will be sent to your email address.
security.email_prefilled: Your email address is pre-filled from your account
security.email_sent_check: Email sent! Check your inbox and click the confirmation link.
security.forgot_password_desc_alt: If you can't access your account, you can also reset your password by entering your email address.

danger.subtitle: Irreversible account actions
danger.warning_banner: The actions on this page are permanent and cannot be undone. Please proceed with caution.
danger.delete_desc: Permanently delete your account and all associated data including order history, reviews, and personal information. A confirmation email will be sent to verify this request.
danger.password_hint: A confirmation link will be sent to your email address. Your account will only be deleted after clicking the link.
danger.email_sent_desc: Check your inbox and click the link to confirm your account deletion. The link expires in 7 days.

hero.subtitle: Our Mission
hero.description: Healthcare shouldn't be complicated — yet so many people struggle to find reliable, well-documented health products in one transparent place. Roy's Shack Est. 1888 brings the spirit of over a century of trusted pharmacy heritage into the digital age. Our mission is to make purchasing health and wellness products simple, safe, and informed. We believe every customer deserves accurate product descriptions, fair prices, and fast delivery — no matter where they are.
hero.title: Roy's Shack Est. 1888
